itunes:title: International Must Reads
title: International Must Reads
description:
In Episode 74 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share their recent international reads. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about books in translation

**If you enjoy our commercial free podcast please consider supporting us on Patreon!Â  We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, + Criminally Booked! Plus, we host fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour and Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & a lively DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons all for just $5 a month!

Loving Lately
3:35 Instacart (check the app for free trial/ use code TSIMMONS1C3E9)
7:56 The Gap's CashSoft Sweater Pants

Latest Reads
10:31 Fairy Tale | Stephen King ðŸŽ§
16:15 The Drowning Kind | Jennifer McMahon (R) ðŸŽ§
22:16Â  Hester | Laurie Lico Albanese from Tina R

23:20 Book Talk
Why are so few books translated in US
Other Article
29:13 My Brilliant Friend | Elena Ferrante, Translated by Ann Goldstein
33:50 The Hacienda | Isabel Canas (T)
Comps - Mexican Gothic meets Rebecca
38:09 In Her Wake | Amanda Jennings (R)
43:34 Tender is the Flesh | Agustina Bazterrica, translator Sarah Moses (T)
49:49 We Know You Remember | Tove Alsterdal, translator Alice Menzies(R) ðŸŽ§
You Will Never Be Found | Tove Alsterdal

Shelf Additions
A Nail in the Head - corrected title isÂ  Head Like A Hole | Andrew Van Wey (T)
58:00 Big Swiss | Jen Beagin (R)
Like a House on Fire | Lauren McBrayer

Love audiobooks like us?Â  Head to Libro.fm & find your next must listen audiobook while supporting your favorite Independent Bookstore! *link is an affiliate , which we earn a small commission at no cost to you

*The book titles listed are Amazon Affiliate links (our additional affiliate links to Bookshop & Blackwell's are below) where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!

Email us at booktalketc@gmail
